ch0356_00_zeiyu/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Just because we didn’t agree to meet
doesn’t mean you get to keep me waiting!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/0101_0701_02_10:
You seem kinda bored. Want me to
battle you?
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m a student at Blueberry Academy, so I
can’t just battle every day.
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7101_0701_03_10: What about you? Don’t you have to study?
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7101_0701_04_10:
Hehe... I should totally put you to the test
next time!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7102_0701_01_10:
Pasio feels like one big resort that hosts
festivals all year round.
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7102_0701_02_10:
But honestly, nothing beats the Festival of
Masks in Kitakami.
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7102_0701_03_10:
Why? Uh... Well, the energy there is just on
another level!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7103_0701_01_10:
When it comes to Kitakami souvenirs, apples
and mochi are super popular.
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7103_0701_02_10:
But I’ve had a rough time with mochi, so I’m
not eating one anytime soon.
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7103_0701_03_10:
Kiki knows what happened the last time
I had one, but...
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7103_0701_04_10:
Don’t even think about asking him what it
was! It’s the most embarrassing thing I’ve
ever done!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7104_0701_01_10:
Seriously, what’s up with this island?! There
are ridiculously strong people all over!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7104_0701_02_10:
And honestly, some of them try to start a
battle without even saying a word. Such bad
manners, if you ask me!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7104_0701_03_10:
I mean, I am a talented Trainer, so I can
handle it, but...
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7104_0701_04_10:
How am I supposed to go for a walk
like this?
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you’ve been
staring at me for a while now.
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7105_0701_02_10: Feel free to be dazzled by how great I look!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7105_0701_03_10:
While you’re distracted by my beauty,
I’ll give you a good thrashing!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/7105_0701_04_10:
What’s that? You were only staring ’cause
I’m funny?!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/1701_0701_01_10:
You sure you don’t want this? C’mon, you
know you do. Since you want it THAT
bad...I’ll give it to you!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/1701_0702_01_10:
You’ve been working hard, so I wanted to
give you something good!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s not crowded with people or full of
buildings like the city.
ch0356_00_zeiyu/2501_0701_03_10:
But maybe that’s what makes it nice. I feel
safe when I’m back home.
ch0356_00_zeiyu/2501_0702_01_10: On home turf, my win rate’s close to 100%!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/2501_0702_02_10:
When you come to Kitakami, I’ll make you
eat dirt!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/2511_0701_01_10: You get along with Kiki, right?
ch0356_00_zeiyu/2511_0701_02_10:
I’m trying not to overthink it or anything...
People his age act up in a way, y’know?
ch0356_00_zeiyu/2511_0701_03_10:
But honestly, as long as he’s having fun,
I’m cool with it!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/2511_0702_01_10:
Kiki’s always been a tough brother to
handle, so as his older sister, I feel like I
have to look out for him.
ch0356_00_zeiyu/2511_0702_02_10: I can’t just leave him on his own.
ch0356_00_zeiyu/3001_0701_01_10:
*yawn* I’m kinda sleepy... Let’s take it easy
in the morning and give it our all in
the afternoon!
ch0356_00_zeiyu/3003_0701_01_10:
Come to say hi all on your own, eh?
Good, good! I’m heading out to lunch now.
Wanna join?
ch0356_00_zeiyu/3005_0701_01_10:
Still working hard, huh? Hmm... All right,
I’ll join you for a bit, then.
